# Figures only version {-}
This is a figures only version of a set of GSL water quality and nutrient analyses. All data are drawn from USGS NWIS. Figures are based on data from calendar years 2010 - 2018.  
For details and code see: [bookdown.org/jakevl/gsl-nutrients-2019](https://bookdown.org/jakevl/gsl-nutrients-2019/){target="_blank"}
